author: markt
msg: Fix bug 31465. Ensure that the compiler reads the .java file using
the same encoding as that with which it was written.

author: remm
msg: - Allow configuring the interval following a compilation during which a JSP will not be checked for modifications.

author: remm
msg: - Fix cosmetic issue where extra CRLF would be inserted during each precompilation.

author: luehe
msg: Copied XML encoding detection logic into JASPER, so we're no longer dependent on Xerces.
All JSP TCKs are passing again.
